channel.title: TNT issue
channel.description:
I just planted 340 TNT, it turned night dug myself a hole inside the TNT, I look up as its day and see a creeper stood on top of me
what the fuck do i do, if i try move up it's gonna blow and that is gonna be one big ass explosion, I'm not ready to blow yet, especially not with me in it.
I've not seen one all day and now when I have 300 + blocks of TNT around me they show up.

item.title: TNT issue
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Mr Mopar X:

You can switch to peaceful mode, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: TNT issue
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

You can switch to peaceful mode, lol.

item.title: TNT issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:6, topic:379511”]http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=100267&p=1494675#p1494675

here you go
compatible with 1.2 beta

before you do /home though, it drops your items as well. you could also do /killnpc
Also, ahve you thought of setting the difficulty to peaceful as to remove all mobs then resetting again?[/quote]

Thanks, I’ll just install that.

Read full topic

item.title: TNT issue
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=100267&p=1494675#p1494675

here you go
compatible with 1.2 beta

before you do /home though, it drops your items as well. you could also do /killnpc
Also, ahve you thought of setting the difficulty to peaceful as to remove all mobs then resetting again?

Read full topic

item.title: TNT issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:4, topic:379511”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=475351.msg3476033#msg3476033 date=1295716078]

I just planted 340 TNT, it turned night dug myself a hole inside the TNT, I look up as its day and see a creeper stood on top of me

what the fuck do i do, if i try move up it’s gonna blow and that is gonna be one big ass explosion, I’m not ready to blow yet, especially not with me in it.

I’ve not seen one all day and now when I have 300 + blocks of TNT around me they show up.
[/quote]put single player commands on and do /home or /noclip to get out

There is no commands for /home or /noclip

o.0

You’ll need to mod your client.jarba
Want a link?[/quote]

Yeah, please.

Read full topic
